edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.textsegmenter.texttiling
Class TextTiling

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.textsegmenter.texttiling.TextTiling

public class TextTiling
extends java.lang.Object

An implementation of Marti Hearst's text tiling algorithm.

Author:
Freddy Choi, Philip R. Burns. Modified for integration in MorphAdorner.

Use of this code is free for academic, education, research and other non-profit making uses only.
